resources.string: Your new password will appear here
Using a strong password isn\'t the only step you should take to protect yourself. \n \n Consider enabling two-factor authentication, and never reuse passwords for important accounts.
Two-factor authentication is a system that uses either your mobile device or other physical hardware to add another layer of protection to your account.

A year-long study from Google in conjunction with the universities of New York and San Diego has shown that two-factor authentication is highly effective, blocking an average of:
 100% of automated attacks
 98.3% of phishing attacks
 88.6% of directly targeted attacks performed by skilled hackers authentication blocks
